translations: 天主教徒；教皇党人（某些新教教徒对天主教徒的蔑称）

sentences.sentence: And the head of the BBC, Mark Thompson, is of the Papist persuasion.
sentences.translation: 英国广播公司(BBC)的总裁马克·汤普森是个教皇派。

sentences.sentence: Church Joseph is the most old and well-maintained papist church in Chongqing.
sentences.translation: 若瑟堂是重庆市至今保存最完好、最古老的天主教堂。

sentences.sentence: Then he dreamed that he turned Papist, of all his dreams the only one, we suspect, which came through the gate of horn.
sentences.translation: 他又梦见自己成了天主教徒，我们猜想，他所有的梦只有这一个通过了角门而应验了。
